data.title: Jared Earle - 2013 - Baseball
data.meta_description: Jared Earle (15) RHP  - EARLE'S STATSCareer |  2010  | 2011 |  2012  |  20132013 - Senior Season: Pitched in seven contests, totaling
data.text:
EARLE'S STATS

Career | 2010 | 2011 | 2012 | 2013

2013 - Senior Season: Pitched in seven contests, totaling 9.0 innings of work...pitched 1.2 innings at Purdue (April 2)...pitched an inning without an earned run in win over Northern Kentucky (April 24)...worked a perfect inning at Bellarmine (April 30)...pitched a shutout inning at IPFW (May 8).

2012 - Junior Season: Made four bullpen appearances before being shut down by injury...had 1.80 ERA in 5.0 innings with six strikeouts...fanned all three batters he saw at Fresno State (Feb. 19)...pitched two frames and struck out two at Belmont (March 3).

2011 - Sophomore Season: Made 14 relief appearances, totaling 20.0 innings...earned two saves...pitched a shutout inning vs. IPFW (March 1)...threw two scoreless frames for a save vs. Oakland (March 6)...fanned four batters vs. Mt. Marty College (March 13)...gave up no earned runs in 1.2 innings vs. Purdue (April 6)...struck out two and allowed no earned runs over 1.2 innings at Dayton (April 12)...pitched 2.0 innings for a save at IPFW (May 10)...pitched 2.1 effective innings vs. Milwaukee (May 15)...struck out three over 1.2 innings at Cincinnati (May 17).

2010 - Freshman Season: Made 17 appearances, starting six ballgames...worked 48.1 innings, ranking third on the team...fanned 32 batters against 15 walks...worked 6.0 innings to pick up first collegiate win vs. Buffalo (March 19)...pitched a scoreless inning in win over IPFW (March 31)...struck out four in relief appearance at UIC (April 9)...pitched 6.0 innings and struck out four to get second win of season vs. Dayton (April 14)...allowed just one run over 6.0 innings at Youngstown State to improve to 3-1 (April 25).

High School: Four-year letter winner and two-time team MVP at Southmont...named all-area and all-conference twice...set school records with 169 career strikeouts and a 1.97 ERA...batted .452 with 13 extra-base hits and 22 RBIs as a senior...hit .457 with 22 runs and 19 RBIs as a junior...compiled a 21-game hitting streak during junior season...recorded a 15-8 career record on the mound with 18 complete games and seven saves...set school single-game (19) and season (161) strikeout records...also a four-year letterwinner in tennis...earned all-conference and all-area accolades in tennis.
